profile.description: Information provided will be displayed on your Gateway profile.

connected-accounts.description: Connect your account to claim credentials with third-party platforms requirements.

twitter.title: Twitter
twitter.description: Connect your account to claim credentials with follow profile, retweet and post a tweet requirements.

github.title: Github
github.description: Connect your account to claim credentials with repository contribution and pull requests requirements.

account-management.gateway-id-desc: This is your Gateway ID. You can edit it once a month.
account-management.wallet-section-desc: By connecting your wallet, we will only request the access to see address, account balance, activity and suggest transactions to approve.
account-management.email-section-desc: By connecting your email, we will only send notifications by the primary email.

other-wallet.title: Other accounts
other-wallet.desc: We never share any of your data with third parties, and we only request the access permissions necessary to provide you with the best possible service when you connect your accounts to Gateway. Check our

delete-section.title: Delete account
delete-section.desc: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
delete-section.modal-title: Are you sure you want delete your account?
delete-section.modal-alert-description: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
delete-section.modal-explain-topic-1: You won't lost your credential, they will still be connected to the accounts they were issued for
delete-section.modal-explain-topic-4: You won't be able undo this action
delete-section.modal-explain-topic-5: To confirm deletion, type {{confirmDelete}} into the field and mark the checkbox
delete-section.modal-explain-topic-6: I acknowledge that upon account deletion and Gateway ID deactivation, I won't be able undo these actions

account-management.registered-email-description: Email is mainly used for important updates related to your account.
account-management.email-address-helper: To update your email is necessary verify it.
account-management.verify-your-email-description: It has been sent a code for your email address. Paste the code here to verify it. This code will expire in 30 minutes.
account-management.email-error-sending: There was an error sending the code
account-management.email-error-validating: There was an error validating the code

add-email.title: Connect email
add-email.subtitle: Email
add-email.description: Adding another email you increase the chances of receiving credentials
add-email.label: E-mail address

verify-token.description2: for an email from Gateway and enter your code below. This code will expire in 30 minutes.

modal-delete-email.checkbox-info: I acknowledge the account disconnection from my Gateway ID

dapp.title: On Gateway
dapp.description: Select which notifications to get directly on Gateway.
dapp.all: Turn on all notifications on Gateway

email.title: By email
email.description: Select which notifications to get by email.
email.all: Turn on all notifications by email

credential_published.title: Credential published
credential_published.description: When a credential of a organization that you follows publishes a credential.
